projectGridLines.title: Web Handling
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Web Handling

Description: A portal to manage the complete process of skill development training institutions. It has three major modules: student management, training management and placement management. Students can create an account and access to build his personal profile, able to enroll for available courses, recorded sessions, access to training content, assessments, apply for available jobs posted by the placement officer. Trainers should be able to post training content to students, mark studentâ€™s attendance, Assessment & evaluation process. Placement officers will be posting available job vacancies for students and get the list of applied candidates for each post and post placement follow ups

And other portals.
